forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 37F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Some freezing rain late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Some icy conditions developing late. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
